name: Warscythe
description: Replaces Staff of Light, No Saving throw, AP 2D6 + S vs. vehicles, Codex p.14

name: Chronometron
description: Roll extra D6, discard lowest for sweeping advance and fall back, Codex p.14

name: Disruption Field
description: Any hit while assaulting a vehicle will glance on 6 regardless of armor, Codex p.14

name: Gaze of Flame
description: Assaulting units lose +1 atk for charging.  Enemy models in close combat suffer -1 LD, Codex p.14

name: Lightning Field
description: S3 AP- hit to enemy per wound inflicted on this unit in close combat, Codex p.14

name: Nightmare Shroud
description: Enemies within 12 inches must morale check as if taken 25% casualties, Codex p.14

name: Ressurrection Orb
description: Necrons within 6 inches may self repair despite instant kill or power weapons, Codex p.14

name: Solar Pulse
description: Night fight does not apply for 1 turn.  If it is not night, night fight applies to any unit firing at lord for 1 turn, Codex p.14

name: Veil of Darkness
description: Lord and 1 unit of Necrons within 6 inches may deep strike instead of movement, may be used to escape close combat. Codex p.14

description: Any hit while assaulting a vehicle will glance on 6 regardless of armor, Codex p.14
